#summary Node type ntCData

= Description =

Node types of `ntCData` are CDATA section nodes which don't have child nodes nor attributes - just an unparsed text value. 

= Example =

<code language="xml">
<book><![CDATA[now we can use < > without escaping]]></book>
</code>

The book node doesn't have a `.text` property, only a ntCData child node.

== Delphi Code ==
<code language="delphi">
var
  BookNode, Node: TXmlNode;
begin
  ...
  // Add a node
  Node.AddChild('book');

   // Add a CDATA section
  BookNode.AddChild('', ntCData).Text := 'now we can use < > without escaping'</code>
